name: Grow Down
description:
Get a feeling of being a plant in Grow Down. 

Deepen your roots - search the soil but keep an eye out for traps and dangerous items. 

Grow down - get deeper into the ground. 

Find a permanent water source to become a bigger and stronger plant. Look for more water - growing means needing it in substantial amount. 

Roots also need nourishment - consider the size of your root system carefully. 

Growing takes time. Move towards your goal relaxed.

Music by Olexy.
